@Ghost Next time i suggest you google it before to ask. Its kinda a topic that come often. But here is the same answer you will probably get everywhere.

First download and install Deamon tool. After mount the game image you just downloaded. 

Install the game. (Dont launch the game just yet)

After check on the mounted disk image usually there is a crack folder or maybe its a folder with the scene name (Skidrow, ect) Copy the file and paste it where you installed the game.

Now you make a shortcut of the exe file (Not the launcher) to the desktop and your game is usually ready to go.
